channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+2778] Epic News Headline...(pic)
[+1967] When Pixar Meets Star Wars (PIC)
item.description: A while back I featured a series of toys from a guy named Silof. They were Star Wars characters imagined as Samurai warriors, and they were thoroughly awesome.

item.title: [+1714] Monster Crab Exits Shell (Time-Lapse Video)
item.description: Crazy looking time-lapse video of a monster sized crab molting out of its shell. This probably happens millions of times a day it just looks so friggin' weird.

item.title: [+1633] Creationists suffer another legal defeat
item.description: The Institute for Creation Research — one of the biggest nonsense-paddlers in the 6000 year history of the world — was handed a nice defeat this week. The Texas Higher Education Coordination Board denied the ICR the ability to grant Master’s degrees in their graduate school. They also denied a temporary extension while appealing.

item.title: [+1531] Video: Massive iPhone 4 Flaw Revealed
item.description: The newly released Apple iPhone 4 appears to have a significant design flaw that means the device loses network signal when you hold it in your hand.It's a major problem for the latest iPhone – which saw plastic bands placed around the metal rim to prevent aerial problems.

item.title: [+1303] YouTube + Vuvuzela Button = WIN.
item.description: YouTube seems to have added a Vuvuzela button to all it's videos to allow any user to add an epic soundtrack to their videos! I picked a video that many of you would probably like to dub a vuvuzela over. Try it out on any video!

item.title: [+1097] Hayden Panettiere Opens a Bottle of Champagne
[+1080] It is raining oil in Louisiana! :(
item.description: Louisiana residents witness a strange rain that leaves oil puddles near their homes.

item.title: [+1049] What Would Jesus Do vs What Jesus Freaks Actually Do (Pics)
item.description: Have you ever noticed that Jesus and His followers don't seem to be on the same page?

item.title: [+859] 35 Pictures That Demand Explanation (PICS)
item.description: Here are 35 ultra-weird pictures that really do need some sort of explanation to help us understand.

item.title: [+834] Reason To Remember The Macarena Ever Existed (video)
item.description: Shot today while roaming the grounds of the Playboy Mansion

item.title: [+753] Nintendo 3DS - But it doesn't require glasses.
item.description: The 3DS: Nintendo's answer to magic. It will allow a 3D effect without the use of glasses...WHAT?

item.title: [+718] The Problem [Comic]
[+706] Firefox update brings protection from Flash crashes
item.description: Mozilla has released a Firefox update that introduces support for plugin isolation. It will prevent Flash crashes from taking down the whole browser.

item.title: [+649] Whooping cough now an epidemic in California
item.description: Phil Plait comments on a recent California Department of Public Health statement that whooping cough "is now officially an epidemic in California." Phil is clear in his criticisms of anti-vax celebrities and other opponents of sound medical science.

item.title: [+573] NPH Confirmed For 'Harold and Kumar 3'
item.description: Neil Patrick Harris possesses the awesomeness to rise from the dead.

item.title: [+543] Study: Woman's history of orgasm discernible from her walk
item.description: Exploratory analyses suggest that greater pelvic and vertebral rotation and stride length might be characteristic of the gait of women who have experienced vaginal orgasm.

item.title: [+541] Internet Explorer 9 destroys Chrome 6 in speed test (Vid)
item.description: IE9 is some orders of magnitude faster than HTML5 when it comes to hardware-accelerated canvas rendering. In some other initial benchmarks, see video IE9 is about 30% slower than Chrome 6 in the SunSpider JavaScript benchmark -- and about 10% faster than Firefox 3.7.

item.title: [+536] Nike Pedob-Airs (PIC)
[+514] Still Hot? Louis Vuitton Models Pose Without Makeup
item.description: Some look pretty good regardless of cosmetic enhancements. Others (#22 for example) might leave you wondering WTF?
